descriptionNullable:
#Context This is a clean image dataset of sports balls collected using [DuckDuckGo](https://duckduckgo.com/) search engine. There are 10 classes.
1. Football 2. Basketball 3. Volleyball 4. Rugby 5. Golf 6. Cricket 7. Tennis 8. Bowling 9. Billiards 10. Baseball
This dataset is already cleaned and validated using `Fast.Ai`.
>**The scraped program** of this dataset is in [Sports-Ball-Recognizer](https://github.com/kavinh07/Sports-Ball-Recognizer.git) GitHub repository. #Content The file contains 10 folders. Each folder represents the label of the images inside it. > 📂**Sports-Ball-Dataset** >> 📂 **Football:** 224 images. >> 📂 **Basketball:** 278 images. >> 📂 **Volleyball:** 261 images. >> 📂 **Rugby:** 307 images. >> 📂 **Golf:** 264 images. >> 📂 **Cricket:** 255 images. >> 📂 **Tennis:** 273 images. >> 📂 **Bowling:** 286 images. >> 📂 **Billiards:** 279 images. >> 📂 **Baseball:** 272 images. #Data Preparation - **Data Collection:** Downloaded from DuckDuckGo using term name and adding extra string ' only balls images'. A total of 2872 images were collected initially. After unlinking the damaged data, the total number of images was 2776. - **Dataloader:** Used FastAI DataBlock API to set up the DataLoader. - **Data Augmentation:** FastAI provides default data augmentation which operates in GPU. - **Data Cleaning:** Since I collected data from the browser, there were many noises. Also, some images contained irrelevant data. I cleaned and updated data using FastAI ImageClassifierCleaner.
#Acknowledgement Please include citations for this dataset if you use it in your own research.
#Inspiration This dataset can be used for sports ball classification.
title: Sports Ball Dataset
subtitle: Image Dataset of Sports Ball
description:
#Context This is a clean image dataset of sports balls collected using [DuckDuckGo](https://duckduckgo.com/) search engine. There are 10 classes.
1. Football 2. Basketball 3. Volleyball 4. Rugby 5. Golf 6. Cricket 7. Tennis 8. Bowling 9. Billiards 10. Baseball
This dataset is already cleaned and validated using `Fast.Ai`.
>**The scraped program** of this dataset is in [Sports-Ball-Recognizer](https://github.com/kavinh07/Sports-Ball-Recognizer.git) GitHub repository. #Content The file contains 10 folders. Each folder represents the label of the images inside it. > 📂**Sports-Ball-Dataset** >> 📂 **Football:** 224 images. >> 📂 **Basketball:** 278 images. >> 📂 **Volleyball:** 261 images. >> 📂 **Rugby:** 307 images. >> 📂 **Golf:** 264 images. >> 📂 **Cricket:** 255 images. >> 📂 **Tennis:** 273 images. >> 📂 **Bowling:** 286 images. >> 📂 **Billiards:** 279 images. >> 📂 **Baseball:** 272 images. #Data Preparation - **Data Collection:** Downloaded from DuckDuckGo using term name and adding extra string ' only balls images'. A total of 2872 images were collected initially. After unlinking the damaged data, the total number of images was 2776. - **Dataloader:** Used FastAI DataBlock API to set up the DataLoader. - **Data Augmentation:** FastAI provides default data augmentation which operates in GPU. - **Data Cleaning:** Since I collected data from the browser, there were many noises. Also, some images contained irrelevant data. I cleaned and updated data using FastAI ImageClassifierCleaner.
#Acknowledgement Please include citations for this dataset if you use it in your own research.
#Inspiration This dataset can be used for sports ball classification.
